text: "Freak of the Week" is a song by British rappers Krept and Konan, featuring vocals from American singer Jeremih. The song was released for digital download in the United Kingdom on 28 June 2015 as the first single from their debut album The Long Way Home (2015). The single peaked at number nine on the UK Singles Chart. The song also contains a sample of "Who Am I (Sim Simma)" by Beenie Man. ==Music video== The music video was uploaded to Vevo on 5 May 2015.
